name: SuperM.GO
description:
You like to play the classic platform games, but you've been wanting to add a twist, have you?
SuperM.Go is a modern platformer with beautiful 3D graphics and the ability to create your own, unique game worlds!
Have you wanted to complete a level consisting of only coins or create the most complex location in the world for a long time? All this you can do in the game SuperM.Go now! Create your own unique levels for the game, share them with friends and have fun!

A key feature of the game is an advanced locations constructor and a unique level editor in which you can:
- create new locations of different complexity
- connect your locations in multi-level games
- share your levels with friends and all the world
- send your level to the administration and get to the main page of the game

After purchasing the game, you can create your own levels or play on the levels of other users without additional payments.

Create. Share. Play.

P.S. If you are reading this information in anticipation of downloading, then enjoying the game, do not forget to go back to the store and write your detailed and very important review for me!
